featured.text: According to a recent marketing study, young adults influence 88% of household clothing purchases.
This process, known as “coral bleaching,” has happened more and more frequently in recent years.
Typhoon Morakot claimed more than six hundred lives in early August of 2009, making it the most serious natural _____ in Taiwan in recent decades.
Recent or repeated exposure to a song or even a small part of a song can also trigger earworms, as can word associations, such as a phrase similar to the lyrics of a song.

other.text: But this story written 40 years ago __(27)__ predicted the arrival of a recent method of genetic engineering—cloning.
According to recent research, children under the age of 12 are generally not _____ enough to recognize risk and deal with dangerous situations.
Recent experiments with this device showed that 80% of the participants were fooled by the smell.

Even though 65% of teens claim that they rely on themselves for their fashion ideas, it is estimated that less than 20% of the teen population is innovative enough to drive fashion trends, according to a recent study by a marketing firm.
Over the recent years, it has faced growing pressure to hand back the Elgin Marbles, sculptures taken from the Parthenon in Athens, Greece, in the 19th century.
Recent research has shown that there are biological differences between boys and girls.
Recent research has found lots of evidence to the drug company’s claims about its “miracle” tablets for curing cancer.
According to a recent study, almost three-quarters of American high school juniors said they felt stress at least once a week, some almost daily.
However, recent studies have shown (70) interest in storytelling for adults is returning.
did you know that according to recent research, people are losing the art of laughter and it could have a (33) effect on our health?
However, the tradition of men wearing it has faded in recent times, so nowadays we see a lot more women than men wearing one.
In recent years, the soybean has been used in making many different foods and has become the atom of health food.
Both issues result from the tide of violence that has crossed the region in recent years.
Recent studies indicate that the two halves of the brain—the right hemisphere and the left hemisphere — play extremely important roles in learning and communicating.
Recent studies show that humans and zebrafish have the same major organs and share 70 percent of the genes.
Recent studies show that people spend an average of 64 hours a week sitting, whether or not they exercise 150 minutes a week as recommended by World Health Organization (WHO).
According to a recent study, the part of your brain that reacts to severe pain is largely the same part that reacts to expectation of pain.
The recent cooking oil scandals have led to calls for tougher ______ of sales of food products.

definition.en_def: Having happened or started only a short time ago.
definition.example: I read a recent article about climate change.
